calendar_simulation

Class CalendarSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • calendar_simulation.CalendarSystem

  • public class CalendarSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The class which contains all the data that are shown to the user. It also contains all the operations the user can do in this calender simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CalendarSystem()
      create the CalenderSystem with the file containing the data previously stored in an exteral file

      • login

        int login(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password)
   throws java.io.IOException,
          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        let the user log in with given information. This would compare this information with the data previously stored in an external file. It returns an int indicating whether the logging attempt was successful or not.
        Parameters:
        username - the user name of the user
        password - the password of the user
        Returns:
        1 if successful -1 if unsuccessful
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception in file I/O
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - an exception in serialization

        Returns:
        1 if successful -1 if unsuccessful
